uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

Lot.title: Lot
Lot.description: Represents a land lot with its attributes.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Lot entity.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this lot.

productiveUnitId.description: The ID of the productive unit this lot belongs to.

crop.description: The primary crop grown in this lot (e.g., Café, Aguacate).

areaHectares.description: Area of the lot in hectares.

sowingDensity.description: Densidad de siembra del lote (árboles por hectárea).

distanceBetweenPlants.description: Distancia de siembra entre plantas en una misma fila (metros).

distanceBetweenRows.description: Distancia de siembra entre filas o surcos (metros).

totalTrees.description: Número total de árboles en el lote.

phAverage.description: Nivel de pH promedio del suelo.

SubLot.title: SubLot
SubLot.description: Represents a sub-division of a lot with its own specific attributes.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SubLot entity.

lotId.description: The ID of the parent Lot.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns the parent lot.

sowingDate.description: Optional sowing date for the sub-lot.

sowingDensity.description: Sowing density of the sub-lot (trees per hectare).

distanceBetweenPlants.description: Distancia de siembra entre plantas en una misma fila (metros).

distanceBetweenRows.description: Distancia de siembra entre filas o surcos (metros).

areaHectares.description: Area of the sub-lot in hectares.

totalTrees.description: Total number of trees in the sub-lot.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Staff entity.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this staff data.

contact.description: Contact information for the staff member.

eps.description: Health insurance provider (EPS) for the staff member.

baseDailyRate.description: Base daily rate for the staff member.

certifications.description: Certificaciones obtenidas por el trabajador, separadas por comas.

StaffAttendance.title: Staff Attendance
StaffAttendance.description: Represents a daily attendance record for a staff member.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Attendance record.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this attendance data.

date.description: The date of the attendance record.

reason.description: The reason for absence, if applicable.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a task to be performed.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Task entity.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this task.

category.description: Category of the task (Preparation, Sowing, Maintenance, Harvest, Post-Harvest, Other).

dependsOn.description: ID of another Task that this task depends on.

startDate.description: Fecha de inicio de la labor.

endDate.description: Fecha de finalización de la labor.

isRecurring.description: Indica si la labor es recurrente.

recurrenceFrequency.description: La frecuencia con la que se repite la labor.

recurrenceInterval.description: El intervalo para la frecuencia de recurrencia (ej. cada 2 semanas).

status.description: Estado de cumplimiento de la labor.

plannedCost.description: Calculated planned cost for the task.

supplyCost.description: Calculated cost of supplies used for the task.

actualCost.description: Calculated actual cost based on progress and supply usage.

downtimeMinutes.description: Tiempo de inactividad de la labor en minutos.

harvestedQuantity.description: Cantidad cosechada (ej. en Kg) para labores de tipo 'Cosecha'.

plannedSupplies.description: A list of supplies planned for this task.

quantity.description: The planned quantity of the supply to be used.

ProductiveUnit.title: Unidad Productiva
ProductiveUnit.description: Información general de la finca o unidad productiva del usuario.

crops.description: Lista de cultivos en la unidad productiva.

varieties.description: Lista de variedades de los cultivos.

Supply.title: Supply
Supply.description: Represents a supply item in the inventory.

SupplyUsage.title: Supply Usage
SupplyUsage.description: Represents an instance of a supply being used in a task.

date.description: The specific date the supply was used.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a financial transaction, either an income or an expense.

/users/{userId}.description: Collection for storing user profile information. Each document is owned by a single user.

/lots/{lotId}.description: Collection for storing Lot entities. Each document is owned by a single user, enforced by security rules on the 'userId' field.

/lots/{lotId}/sublots/{sublotId}.description: Collection for storing SubLot entities within a specific Lot. Each document represents a sub-division of a lot.

/staff/{staffId}.description: Collection for storing Staff entities. Each document is owned by a single user, enforced by security rules on the 'userId' field.

/staffAttendance/{attendanceId}.description: Collection for storing daily staff attendance records. Each document is owned by a single user, enforced by security rules on the 'userId' field.

/tasks/{taskId}.description: Collection for storing Task entities. Each document is owned by a single user, enforced by security rules on the 'userId' field.

/tasks/{taskId}/supplyUsages/{usageId}.description: Sub-collection for tracking supplies used in a specific task.

/productiveUnits/{unitId}.description: Collection for storing the user's productive units. Each document is a single productive unit owned by a user.

/supplies/{supplyId}.description: Collection for storing inventory supplies. Each document is owned by a single user.

/transactions/{transactionId}.description: Collection for storing financial transactions (income/expense). Each document is owned by a single user.
